about_the_game: Return to a city taken by the supernatural with Tango Gameworks' bonus soundtrack for Ghostwire: Tokyo. Composed by Masatoshi Yanagi and featuring tracks from the Spider's Thread Update, set the stage as spirits and myth take to the streets of modern-day Tokyo.
detailed_description: Return to a city taken by the supernatural with Tango Gameworks' bonus soundtrack for Ghostwire: Tokyo. Composed by Masatoshi Yanagi and featuring tracks from the Spider's Thread Update, set the stage as spirits and myth take to the streets of modern-day Tokyo.

name: Ghostwire: Tokyo - Spider's Thread Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 45 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 310 MB available space

short_description: Explore a city overrun by the supernatural with this bonus tracklist, featuring added music from the Spider's Thread Update for Ghostwire: Tokyo.
